title: Estuaries
creator_credit: Dietmar Fill, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: Micro-photographic study of marine life in estuaries. Shows a great variety of marine animals and plants that thrive in the unique environment of the estuaries, one of the most productive natural systems in the world. Details the lifestyles of the sea horse, semaphore crabs, soldier crabs, prawns, oysters and mangroves.
